title: Job applicants are winning the AI arms race against recruiters
description: Companies have been hit by a wave of chatbot-generated applications

title: Alphabet stock joins $4 trillion club as AI momentum, Apple deal lift sentiment
description: Alphabet became the fourth company to reach a $4 trillion market valuation on Monday, underscoring the scale of investor enthusiasm surrounding artificial intelligence and the dominance of mega-cap technology firms in global equity markets. Alphabet’s shares climbed as much as 2% during the session before paring gains, pushing the company into an elite group that [...]

title: Meta unveils 'Meta Compute' initiative to build AI infrastructure
description: Jan 12 : Meta has announced its "Meta Compute" initiative to build artificial intelligence infrastructure and oversee the social media company's global fleet of data centers and supplier partnerships in its pursuit of superintelligence.CEO Mark Zuckerberg said on Monday that the new initiative will be co-led

title: HIMSSCast: Creating AI agents for healthcare
description: Dr. Edmund Jackson, CEO of UnityAI, discusses the process of developing AI agents focused on scheduling and coordinated care.

title: Wedbush Forecasts Apple’s AI Renaissance in 2026 with $350 Stock Surge
description: Wedbush Securities predicts a transformative 2026 for Apple, driven by its understated AI strategy, including a revamped Siri, Google Gemini partnership, and iPhone 18 launch. Despite criticisms of lagging behind rivals, analysts forecast stock growth to $350, emphasizing ecosystem monetization and services expansion. This subtle approach could spark a tech renaissance.
